content.text:
# Archaeological Museum of Sitia

The Archaeological Museum of Sitia is a museum in Sitia of Crete, in Greece. Its collection consists of Minoan-era finds from Sitia, Zakros, Petra and Palaikastro.
See also
* Palaikastro Kouros
